name: Fargo Vitterande

specials.name: Rat Empathy
specials.description: The wererat can communicate with rodents.

specials.name: Nimble Dodge
specials.description: Trigger Fargo is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker he can see. Effect Fargo gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

specials.name: Change Shape
specials.description: Human with fist +24 for 1d4+3 bludgeoning, or Small rat with Speed 30 feet, climb 10 feet.

specials.name: Curse of the Wererat
specials.description: This curse affects only humanoids. Saving Throw DC 29 Fortitude save. On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into a wererat until dawn. The creature is under the GM’s control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn.

specials.name: Moon Frenzy
specials.description: When a full moon appears in the night sky, Fargo must enter hybrid form, can’t Change Shape thereafter, becomes one size larger, increases his reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of his jaws by 2. When the moon sets or the sun rises, Fargo returns to humanoid form and is fatigued for 2d4 hours.

specials.name: Sneak Attack
specials.description: Fargo deals 3d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

specials.name: Tricky Spell
specials.description: Fargo has learned how to cast many of his spells without hand gestures or incantations. If Fargo's next action is Casting a Spell that has verbal or somatic components, he must attempt a Stealth check against one or more observers' Perception DCs. If he succeeds, the observers do not notice that he had cast a spell. He must still present any material components if the spell requires it.

items: +1 crossbow (20 bolts), leather armor, +1 striking shortsword
spells: blink, confusion, dimension door, illusory creature
blindness, false life, haste, lightning bolt
jump, ray of enfeeblement, true strike (x2)
daze, ghost sound, mage hand, message, shield

strikes.name: jaws
strikes.damage: 1d8+6 piercing plus curse of the wererat

languages: Common, Halfling, Osiriani, Polyglot; rat empathy
